Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Grammistin PpIIb (Group II grammistin; fish, chordates, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the grammistin family (Group 2 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.Fish. Sci. 2001 Feb;67:163-169.]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis IAM 1026 (MIC=6.25 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus IAM 1011 (MIC=3.13 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Aeromonas salmonicida NCIBM 1102 (MIC>50 µg/ml), Escherichia coli JCM 1649 (MIC=50 µg/ml), P. dameselae subsp. Piscicida Sp 9587 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium S1 (MIC>50 µg/ml), S. putrefaciens IAM 1509 (MIC=6.25 µg/ml), Vibrio anguillarum NCIBM 829 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Vibrio parahaemolyticus (MIC=25 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Primary and secondary structures of grammistins, peptide toxins isolated from the skin secretion of the soapfish Pogonoperca punctata.
Literature.Author: Shiomi K, Yokota H, Nagashima Y, Ishida M.
